DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Identifying patient n't self care lymphedema may help doctor plan good at-home self-care treatment . PURPOSE : This research study look self-care practice lymphedema patient breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Self-Care Lymphedema Patients With Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To systematically identify describe barrier complete recommend home self-care lymphedema patient breast cancer . - To identify patient recall instruction home self-care practice lymphedema tell healthcare professional others . - To identify current home self-care practice breast cancer survivor treatment treat lymphedema . Secondary - To examine relationship home self-care activity symptom breast cancer survivor lymphedema . - To examine relationship home self-care activity quality life breast cancer survivor lymphedema . - To identify patient-perceived benefit home self-care . OUTLINE : Patients complete questionnaire breast cancer diagnosis treatment history , lymphedema history problem , year education income . Patients also complete survey home self-care practice lymphedema benefit , burden , barrier home care .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : History breast cancer Lymphedema one arm occur breast cancer treatment Must receive prior lymphedema treatment healthcare professional Patients selfreported arm swelling subsequent breast cancer treatment treat healthcare professional eligible Hormone receptor status specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Menopausal status specify English speak PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
